title: LF Backup Mid lane, Top lane (Plat+ if possible; no lower than gold IV)
body:
Currently I have a fully fledged team formed, however we might need some fill ins or replacements if they move onto another course in Uni. If you're interested just message me at:

wolfy174@gmail.com

Just post your IGN, preferred champs and position you want.

replies.body:
IGN: ForrestGump main

Lane: Mid

Champions: Zed, Twisted Fate, LeBlanc

Rank: Gold 3

IGN:Offence
Rank: G3
Champs: Maokai, Lulu, Irelia, Lissandra, Sion
Top lane

IGN: Pooge

Rank: G1 Season 4. Currently unranked.

Preferred Champs: Whatever champions are currently strong. Have a tendency for tank top laners more so than carry top laners. No preference for midlane

Preffered position: Comfortable in either mid or toplane
